name: Stuffed French Toast
steps: Spread whipped cream on eight slices of bread making 8 sandwiches.
Cover with wax paper and refrigerate overnight.
When ready to fry dip sandwiches in mixture of eggs, half and half and cinnamon, and vanilla.
Grill on hot grill using non stick spray or butter.
Sauce: Heat apricot jam with orange juice. Bring to a boil and stir until smooth. Serve with sauce and fresh juice.
Can also put fresh fruit in sandwiches (Strawberries, Peaches, Apples etc.)
